typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cld_description as string,
		cld_key as string,
		last_updated_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_claim_detail_pa.parquet']) ~> preDimClaimDetailPA
preDimClaimDetailPA derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_desc = 'All Claim Details') ~> deviredTopLevel
deviredTopLevel alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(top_key))) ~> alterRow
alterRow sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		top_key as string,
		top_id as long,
		top_description as string,
		cld_description as string,
		cld_key as string,
		cld_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['cld_key'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		top_key,
		top_description = top_desc,
		cld_description,
		cld_key
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimClaimDetail
